mapper.insert: insert into lg_company (companyId, companyName, corporateRepresentative, businessLicense, taxRegistrationNumber, affiliatedGroup, registeredCapital, remarks1, remarks2) values (#{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporaterepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businesslicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxregistrationnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{affiliatedgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registeredcapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lg_company set companyName = #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corporateRepresentative = #{corporaterepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, businessLicense = #{businesslicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taxRegistrationNumber = #{taxregistrationnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, affiliatedGroup = #{affiliatedgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registeredCapital = #{registeredcapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where companyId = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select companyId, companyName, corporateRepresentative, businessLicense, taxRegistrationNumber, affiliatedGroup, registeredCapital, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_company where companyId = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select companyId, companyName, corporateRepresentative, businessLicense, taxRegistrationNumber, affiliatedGroup, registeredCapital, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_company
